sentence.Network_en: The sarcoplasmic reticulum is a system of intracellular membranes.
sentence.Network_cn: 肌浆网属于细胞内膜系统.

sentence.Network_en: In order to fuse, intracellular vesicles have to move within the cell.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了融合, 细胞内的囊泡必须在细胞内运动.

sentence.Network_en: Membranes also provide structural support and act to anchor intracellular structures.
sentence.Network_cn: 膜还提供结构的支持,对细胞内的结构起固定作用.
